column4: Does anyone know why when my computer idles the wifi becomes disabled and i have to rmmod b43 and than modprobe b43?
a quick assumption check for power management settings?

i have tried to disable the power management settings to no success...however, why would I want to do that to fix my problem?  I don't really relish the idea of my computer running 24x7 without ever spinning down/hibernating/sleeping...
